module.name: product_version
module.purpose: The Product version application module supports the requirement to identify variants of products. A version is a variant of a product. Every version of a product is equivalent with respect to form, fit and function.

inscope.li: the identification of the organization or person in an organization that is/ was creator of a version;
the identification of the organization or person in an organization that is the supplier of the version of the design;
the capability to represent optional security classification information for the version;
the capability to represent optional approval information for the version.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concept of versioning for products.

definition.def: A version is a collection of all information about something at a point in time. All versions of a thing satisfy the same basic requirements with respect to form, fit and function with later versions possibly having more capability than earlier ones.
A variant is a form or derivation of something. A variant may have more or less properties than the original from which it was derived.

uof.name: Product_Version
uof.description: The Product_Version UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of versioning for products.
